hero.title: Smart wastewater & rainwater solutions for homes and businesses in Estonia
hero.sub: BioDisc®, BioFicient®, BioAir® and BioTec® Flo – reliable treatment, low energy, whisper‑quiet operation.

products.biodisc_desc: Quiet, odour‑free, low‑maintenance. Domestic BA/BB/BC up to 18 PE; commercial up to 300 PE. EN 12566-3 & EN 12255.
products.bioficient_desc: Dual bioreactor across four chambers, low energy, strong targets (BOD5 20 mg/l, SS 30 mg/l, NH4-N 5 mg/l).
products.bioair_desc: Robust PE tank, inlet invert up to 150 cm, up to 97.5% BOD5 reduction. Optional IPS pump.
products.biotec_desc: Two‑stage filtration (synthetic + mineral). Gravity (G) or Pressure (R) version.
products.rainstore_desc: Save up to 50% household water. START/BASIC/GOLD kits.
products.psd1_desc: Telescopic neck 2070–2470 mm, A15 hatch, Pedrollo pumps.

downloads.title: Downloads (PDF)
